catalogue_raissonne: Bartsch 40 (vol. 8, p. 75); New Hollstein W.40; Winzinger 25
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Virgin and child in mandorla; floating angels aloft holding a crown suspended above Virgin's head; Virgin stands on a crescent
markings: stamp on verso, lower center: Paul Davidsohn, Lugt 654
portfolio: From From the Fall and Redemption of Mankind, Plate 40
provenance: Paul Davidsohn (1839-1927'), Lugt 654, born Danzig. John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Virgin Crowned by Two Angels, From the Fall and Redemption of Mankind, Plate 40
